author: Paul Kowal
comment: Updated Oct 2017: No longer works with my new Samsung Note 8. Will still leave 5 stars for those who can use the app.  Hope the developers can resolve issues that make it unusable on current phone.  Best, most useful application I've ever found. Amazing design with an impressive amount of very useful functionality. Paid for license since it's worth every penny!

author: Robert McGrath
comment: YEA BABY! This works. I finally figured it out. Now if my wifi is near, or my BT keyboard, or Chromebook are near my phone does not lock after the first normal unlock. If I get in my car, after a block it vibrates and 'click' its LOCKED. This works way better than Android  SMART LOCK. I bought the license.

author: Andreas Yttergård
comment: Used this on my phone and tablet, very happy with it. Unfortunately I can't use it on my Samsung a5 anymore. Extra annoying since the phone's built in "smart lock" doesn't work at all.

author: Brian Siegel
comment: Just what I needed, allows me to choose how long the phone will remain unlocked after the screen dims out (or since the last unlock, you choose). Many other features also. Paid for license just 2 days into trial (liked that much).
It does what it says on the package; and it does it well! Moreover; as you poke around in the settings, you find lots of nifty features :-D

When my phone is connected to my pebble i don't have to enter my password.  It sounds simple but it's just how I want it.  The android trusted device password bypass does not work as well, you still have to swipe the lock screen which annoys me more than I could even begin to  describe.  I hope this can be ported to nougat or I will be tearing my hair out.
title: Essential app!

author: Winston Yao
comment: Been using this since Android L and still working on Android M. Delayed Lock's timer has not failed me yet and I find it more reliable than using Smart Lock of Android i.e., on body detection and location lock. Delayed Lock's lock after disconnected to WiFi or Bluetooth device is a real plus.

author: M B
comment: The app has a good premise but is still far professional now. App fails 6 out of ten times while on WiFi letting phone lock. While driving using blue tooth app fails allowing phone to lock. App will not uninstall until many steps are performed.

reply.author: j4velin
reply.content: Please send me a mail if you need support. Its really not that hard to uninstall the app - reading the texts in the app or the app description or just using the "uninstall" option directly in the app is enough

author: Kurt B
comment: Have had the paid version of this app installed for over 2 years on my Note 4. Have had issues with it randomly not working when plugged in to power for those whole 2+ years and recently it won't even start up after a reboot. It takes more than an hour for it to start working if it ever does.  Eventually, for whatever reason, it starts working. Pretty unreliable operation and looking for other options now.

reply.author: j4velin
reply.content: Please send me a mail if you need support

author: Mark Muehlhausen
comment: Seems to work to delay lock but fights with Android Pay about PIN vs Password. I want Password, Android Pay disables all my credit cards. Now App won't allow removal.

author: EvanCanton
comment: Works flawlessly on Samsung Tab E with Marshmallow!  Much better than the smart-lock feature, which still seems to lock the tablet at least once every 24 hrs. Many more fatures than smart lock too. Much better than the SkipLock app I was using on my last tablet with Android 4.4.4. The shortcuts are useful too. A very impessive app and impessively secure when using 'protect settings.'  Kudos to developer for a great app with a perfectly reasonable try-out period and a price that is more than fair for such a feature-rich and functional app.

author: sahroo saru
comment: Now, for my moto x on 5.1, it randomly activates the lock screen when WiFi unlock should keep it unlocked. Support said the app's working normally after sending app log. Bluetooth unlock works fine, but I can use android's smart lock for that.

author: paramesh veersha
comment: Not working ,it's says install delayed lock first and then notification toggle, I tried it that way , still the problem persist

author: DAve Shillito
comment: Updated Review: This is one of the first Apps I always install on a new device. Sadly Google broke it with lollipop. But It seems to work fine on Marshmallow (Android 6.0) on MotoG Rev2.  This is great since I really disliked the experience of using Android without Delayed Lock.  Damm!... Eventually it worked again with CynogenMod 13 on my WileyFox Spark+.. But was not aware it would break again with the Android 7.0 upgrade. Had I known I may have avoided the upgrade. Oh well - lets see if stock Android has caught up with this app. :( Nope it looks like it has not. There is no Wifi unlock and no "keep unlocked for n minutes after use"... Looks like I'm going to be typing my pin in all the time :(  Delayed Lock - You will be missed!

author: Geoffry Houze
comment: Works great on my Samsung Note Pro -- Can't wait for it to work on 7.x for my Edge 7. I miss it.....

author: silencio matteo
comment: Asks for permission to access all data and wipe device... bite me!

reply.author: j4velin
reply.content: So how would you implement the "wipe device after x failed unlock attemps" option without the permission to wipe the device?

author: Juan Pablo Tagliavini
comment: Excelente aplicación para hacer cómodo y tener protegido el sistema de bloqueo por contraseña al móvil.

author: Paul G
comment: Works fantastic on my Note 4 (6.0.1) always use it 😀
title: My must have app

author: Phillip Urioste
comment: Works perfectly on Lollipop. Well worth the price.

author: Mahesh BV
comment: Great utility to have

author: Vinit Pandey
comment: So good

reply.author: j4velin
reply.content: Please send me a mail if you need support

author: Michael Shelton
comment: Love it

author: Fernando Rodrigues
comment: App is perfect but adding one more widget,  configurable to a set time,  for example,  having a widget that when pressed, phone would be unlocked for 5 or 10 minutes. I know we have this option but not quite as right now if we set a time it will allways have that time and sometimes it's just not safe. this would make it 5* for me.
title: Need one more thinh

author: Paul Prescott
comment: 4th app of this type that I tried and this is the one that works properly. As inbuilt smart lock features of android are so flakey I just wanted an app that would disable the lock screen when attached to defined WiFi networks and Bluetooth devices and enable it when not. This does both (and more). Other apps would not lock the device when I left a WiFi zone and would only lock after i woke the phone once...this one does. Lots of other useful features like immediate lock when opening the app itself
title: Finally one that works

author: Sabyasachi H
comment: Bit buggy. App icon disappears from Launcher after a restart. Need to reinstall to get it back. Screen keeps flushing after unlocking. Sometimes, WIFI will be connected, still the screen will be locked.    Might purchase after the trial is over.

reply.author: j4velin
reply.content: Please send me a mail if you need support

author: Richard Hodges
comment: This was for sure an awesome app and it worked flawlessly for a day and then it stopped. I'm not sure why because it really does seem amazing.

reply.author: j4velin
reply.content: Please send me a mail if you need support

title: Started so well

author: Bobby Lane
comment: Would be really nice if you could add support for Finger Print scanner passwords.

author: Ashwin Mathur
comment: After restarting mobile

reply.author: j4velin
reply.content: Please send me a mail if you need support

title: Stopped working

comment: Works well for me on two phones... Googles smart lock is useless this is much better

author: John H
comment: working on marshmallow it was me

reply.author: j4velin
reply.content: Please send me a mail if you need support

comment: Works perfectly.  Well made app
title: EXCELLENT!!

author: Elliott Smith
comment: Great!

author: Paolo Stivanin
comment: Very useful app

author: Simon Ball
comment: This app worked exactly how you want it and was great. Unfortunately after upgrading to a Galaxy S5 and Android 5.0 Delayed Lock doesn't work. After upgrading to android 6.0 I can use the app again but I have to disable finger print unlock and use a pin or password instead which defeats the whole security this phone offers. TL:DR don't bother if you own a  Samsung

reply.author: j4velin
reply.content: Please send me a mail if you need support

title: Was a fantastic App

author: Mike May
comment: update 11/12/15: The app keeps forgetting my PIN that i have saved - Samsung Note 4. When I re-enter it, it will remember it for a variable amount of time - anywhere from 15 minutes to 2 days.  Update 9/19/15 - THANK YOU! This new update now works on my Samsung Note 4 running 5.0.1 - much appreciated. I've used this on my Note 3 and now on my Note 4. It has been seamless once I established the wi-fi and Bluetooth conditions to keep my phone unlocked in safe environments.  Update - no longer works at all with Lollipop upgrade.

author: sean hertzsch
comment: I love this app and promote it as much as I can. However, this release is not working on my 2013 Moto X. For about a week, it would not delay locking while in trusted WiFi even if I tried turning it off/on. Now it does not lock the phone, no matter where I am. I really really really hope this gets fixed. I like this app enough to buy it again if I had to and knew that would fix the issue.

reply.author: j4velin
reply.content: Please send me a mail if you need support

title: New release not working

author: John Thatcher
comment: I used the stock 6.0.1 Smart Lock with CM13 on my Find7 and it seemed to be too inconsistent with knowing I'm connected to a trusted device.  I normally don't run with a password but I like the idea of having one.  So this is the best of both worlds passwords when I need it, no password when I don't! Keep up the good work Dev, hope you keep supporting this app.  Just bought the full key
title: Not bad

author: Philip Hughes
comment: Seems to do the job but on my Samsung (Android 5.1.1) it's not an option to do pattern unlock which is annoying - having to revert to a pin unlock. But apart from that it's great so far. I use it to keep the phone from locking when connected to my cars bluetooth. If it locks the Samsung S-Voice can't be activated through the hands free
title: Does the job but one minor annoyance

author: Lars Nilsson
comment: Has worked fine since last update for my encrypted Android 6.0 Nexus 5. It does what it's supposed to do. And have yet to encounter any issues. Only minor complaint is that it does not seem to work with pattern lock.  So I run with PIN.

reply.author: j4velin
reply.content: Well, you can downgrad to Android 5 and use the app as before. Just because something worked on Android 5 doesn't mean it'll work on 6 - yes, Google does change things in some versions :D

title: It just works

author: Dan A Wilson
comment: I wanted to avoid having to use Location Services to get the functionality of Smart Lock at home and in another location (using Trusted Places). This brilliantly designed app picks up on my chosen WiFi networks and does its job without any need for Location Services (and without any need for the offered free Location plug-in) on my phone, even though I am on a Moto E (2015) with the ornery Android 5.0.2 (Lollipop). No problem here, it turns out. Works perfectly on my home network and another (distant) network, and lets me leave the whole Location Services can of worms out of the picture completely.
